κατὰ Νεαίρας
Dem 59
Author(s):
  • Has Probable Author: Apollodorus
Type: Forensic Accusatory Speech
Speaker: Theomnestus
Accusatory speech written for Theomnestus against Neaira for illegally exercising citizenship rights
